an1.248-257:4.1: “The foremost of my lay followers in first going for refuge are the merchants Tapussa and Bhallika.
an1.248-257:5.1: … as a donor is the householder Sudatta Anāthapiṇḍika.
an1.248-257:6.1: … who speak on Dharma is the householder Citta Macchikāsaṇḍika.
an1.248-257:7.1: … who attract a following by the four ways of being inclusive is Hatthaka Āḷavaka.
an1.248-257:8.1: … who donates good things is Mahānāma Sakka.
an1.248-257:9.1: … who donates nice things is the householder Ugga of Vesālī.
an1.248-257:10.1: … who attends on the Saṅgha is the householder Uggata of Hatthi Village.
an1.248-257:11.1: … who has the experiential confidence is Sūrambaṭṭha.
an1.248-257:12.1: … who has confidence in a person is Jīvaka Komārabhacca.
an1.248-257:13.1: … who are intimate is the householder Nakula’s father.”
